definition: Yi river in west Henan, tributary of North Luo river 洛河|洛河[Luo4 he2]
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The Longmen Grottos are situated on the bank of the Yi River in Luoyang, Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 龙门石窟座落在河南省洛阳伊水两岸。

sentences.english: There is a Yi River here, and on the two sides are Fragrant Mountain and longmen Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一条伊水，河两岸是香山和龙门山。

definition: Helan county in Yinchuan 銀川|银川[Yin2 chuan1], Ningxia
Yunxi district of Yueyang city 岳陽|岳阳[Yue4 yang2], Hunan
Fenglin town in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan
to join jade annuli/fig. to combine two good things
Eastern tombs/Dongling district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning
